field.name: Message
field.description: Detailed error message. For example, for a validation exception, this may contain details about validation failure.

field.name: ErrorCode
field.description: An alphanumeric error code which represents this type of error

field.name: Severity
field.description: Severity of the exception. Values: fatal, error, warn

field.name: FieldName
field.description: Qualified name of the field (in dot notation)

field.name: FieldID
field.description: Field id that uniquely identifies the field. This is the qualifed name with indexes for sections included.
